comments:

A code example that produces this would be useful.  If other stack overflow errors are any indication, I expect problem comes from the interaction with the PDOM which make it hard to debug just from the stack trace.
Theoretically, content assist shouldn't be using the PDOM so you shouldn't be getting this exception. I'll take a look and make sure that's true.

Indeed, content assist does not use the PDOM. I'll have to assume you were using a build from before I made this so. If you were using a recent build, please let us know and a attach a code sample so that we can reproduce the problem.
